content: i refer to this pattern https //ravel me/crochet-boa-snake for four row in total it s linked in the pdf and i tell you which of the row to make the linked pattern is by lisa sommers https //www ravelry com/people/lisasommers you can make this pattern with any yarn and corresponding hook i recommend a thin yarn for the snake tongue tho a temperature snake is very customizable so the amount of yarn & colors depends on you personal choice
